name: pecha-berry
effect: Held in battle : When the holder is poisoned, it consumes this item to cure the poison. Used on a party Pokémon : Cures poison.
short_effect: Held: Consumed when poisoned to cure poison.

flavor_text.black_white: If held by a Pokémon, it recovers from poison.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: If held by a Pokémon, it recovers from poison.
